page.title: 02Housing
page.content: Not surprisingly most of the houses in this{rural area}are{detached,}with the exception of the relatively {densely populated villages of Gosmore {and St.Ippolyts,}and the odd terrace {of}cottages.Gosmore has roughly forty houses,St.Ippolyts about sixty.Most of these are{owner-occupied}although renting is not altogether uncommon.In between these two areas lies a {comparatively large council housing estate of some 250 houses which is often referred to as both St.Ippolyts and Gosmore. Immediately north of Gosmore leading into Hitchin lie a{further 200 or so {detached houses.}These are very sizeable and upmarket properties often with very spectacular gardens.Finally {a few houses}fall into our block on the{northern outskirts of Preston which are once again fairly desirable
